Shazlong_Number1: Shezlong is number one in online Arabic psychotherapy worldwide.
Online_Therapist_Online_Header: If you need to talk now, we are here to help you
Online_Therapist_one: one Therapist is ready to start now within 15 mins
Online_Therapist_other: {{count}} Therapists are ready to start now within 15 mins
We_Connect_You_With_Licensed_Therapists: We Connect You With Licensed Therapists
Select_Specialty: Select Specialty Fits That Your Needs
Sign_As_Customer_Body: Answer a few questions to get matched with the right therapist. You can also select the therapist yourself.
Book_Your_Session_Body: Choose date and time that suits you and pay using different payment methods .
Start_Your_Journey_Body: You can communicate with your therapist in different ways during the session: camera, mic, and chatting
Save_Time_And_Effort_Body: Get your session online. No waiting lists, no transportation hassles
Responsive_Team_Body: Our support team is available to help you take your first step and answer non-clinical
Variety_Of_Options_Body: A large number of therapists in various specialties ready to help you with whatever you are facing.
Taking_Care_Of_Mental_Health: Taking Care Of Your Mental Health
Enjoy_App: Enjoy a smoother and easier therapy experience on mobile. Download our app today
Suportive_Team: Our customer support team is always here to answer your non-clinical questions
Contact_them: Contact them anytime anywhere to get the desired help, use the button below or the blue circle on the bottom rightside.
